tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dentures ( Metal Based )  Dental Services/ Ful Dental (Acrylic) / Teeth Whitening,
review:
*** ****** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ***** She is not only polite, and friendly, she treats everyone respectfully (Kids and elderly friendly) .  Her vast experience & skills at dentistry are very matured and she does very appropriate treatment to the ailment you have. 

I have been treated very well and have been advised on multiple occasion how to take care of teeth, denture etc.  She explains her treatment plan very well.  Me and all my family members do consult her and get her treatment when it comes to dental issues.

tags: None
review:
I had some infection in the upper jaw due to a blister for last 25 years with mild pain all the time, because of this I was unable to use two of front teeth. Also I was hesitant to laugh openly as the structure of my front teeth is highly uneven.

When I consulted doctor, I was told "Blister needs to be removed with a minor surgery and then root canal, only then it will last long".

I have undergone surgery and subsequently root canal for two of my teeth.

Great care was taken while doing the root canal/ taking the measurement for crowns/ choosing the right color for crown(to match color with my other from tooth)/fixing the crown. Duration of the treatment lasted for 4-6 weeks due to the complexities involved in jaws and tooth.

Now I CAN LAUGH LOUDLY AND CONFIDENTLY.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
